agents.name: Gmail Email Summarizer
agents.description:
Task: make an agent which summarizes my last n emails from gmail
Workflow steps (execute in order):
  1. Connect to Gmail API and authenticate (Gmail) — Establish authenticated connection to access Gm
agents.prompt: make an agent which summarizes my last n emails from gmail

endpoints.summary: Fetch last n emails from Gmail and generate a summary of their content

query_parameters.name: n
query_parameters.description: Number of last emails to retrieve and summarize

agents.task_description:
Task: make an agent which summarizes my last n emails from gmail
Workflow steps (execute in order):
  1. Connect to Gmail API and authenticate (Gmail) — Establish authenticated connection to access Gmail account
  2. Get the last n emails from the inbox (Gmail) — Retrieve a list of the most recent n email messages with their content
  3. Extract email content including subject, sender, and body text (Gmail) — Parse each email to extract relevant text data for summarization
  4. Generate a summary of the extracted email content (Gmail) — Create a concise summary containing key points from all n emails
  5. Format and present the email summary (Gmail) — Structure the summary in a readable format for the user
Endpoint 0: POST /summarize-emails — Fetch last n emails from Gmail and generate a summary of their content
Services: Gmail
Parameters:
- n (int, query, endpoint 0): Specifies how many of the most recent emails to fetch from Gmail for summarization

agents.name: Top Hackathon Finder
agents.description:
Task: create an agent which searches for the best upcoming hackathons and filters out the top (n) ones
Workflow steps (execute in order):
  1. Search for upcoming hackathon events from multiple source
agents.prompt: create an agent which searches for the best upcoming hackathons and filters out the top (n) ones

endpoints.summary: Search for upcoming hackathons and return the top N filtered results

body_parameters.name: n
body_parameters.description: Number of top hackathons to return

agents.task_description:
Task: create an agent which searches for the best upcoming hackathons and filters out the top (n) ones
Workflow steps (execute in order):
  1. Search for upcoming hackathon events from multiple sources (Web search APIs or hackathon platforms) — Retrieves raw list of upcoming hackathon events with basic details
  2. Extract and standardize hackathon details (Data processing service) — Normalizes hackathon data including dates, locations, prizes, themes, and requirements
  3. Define ranking criteria for hackathon quality (Configuration service) — Establishes scoring metrics such as prize money, organizer reputation, participant limits, and theme relevance
  4. Score and rank all hackathons based on defined criteria (Data analysis service) — Produces ranked list of hackathons with quality scores
  5. Filter and select the top n hackathons from ranked list (Data filtering service) — Returns the specified number of highest-scoring hackathons
  6. Format and present the top hackathons with key details (Output formatting service) — Delivers final list with hackathon names, dates, locations, prizes, and application links
Endpoint 0: POST /search-top-hackathons — Search for upcoming hackathons and return the top N filtered results
Parameters:
- n (int, body, endpoint 0): Specifies how many of the best hackathons to filter and return from the search results
